actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress concerning continuing United States participation with respect to a comprehensive Law of the Sea Treaty.

summary.text: Urges the executive branch to: (1) avoid taking any actions which could foreclose eventual U.S. participation in the Convention on the Law of the Sea; (2) evaluate U.S. objectives for ocean use and relevant foreign policy interests with respect to the Convention; and (3) designate a U.S. representative for the meetings of the Drafting Committee of the Law of the Sea Conference and for the 1982 sessions of the Conference.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress concerning continuing United States participation with respect to a comprehensive Law of the Sea Treaty.
